tool_description: Verifies customer identity documents by analyzing uploaded images and extracting key information for comparison with account data.

document_type.description: Type of document: drivers_license, passport, national_id, utility_bill, bank_statement

document_image_url.description: URL or path to uploaded document image

country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for document origin

state_province.description: State or province code if applicable

strict_name_match.description: Whether name matching should be exact

check_expiration.description: Whether to validate document expiration date

liveness_check.description: Whether to perform anti-fraud liveness detection

extract_address.description: Whether to extract and validate address information

error_messages: Unsupported document type: Use one of [drivers_license, passport, national_id, utility_bill, bank_statement].
Invalid country code: Provide valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
Document image not accessible: Unable to retrieve image from provided URL.
Poor image quality: Image quality below minimum threshold, request clearer photo.
OCR confidence too low: Unable to extract text with sufficient confidence.
Document expired: The provided document has expired.
Document appears fraudulent: Liveness check failed, document may be fake.
Name mismatch: Document name doesn't match account holder name.
Invalid threshold values: quality_threshold and confidence_threshold must be 0-100.
usage: Provide account_id, document_type, document_image_url, and country_code. Configure verification settings with optional parameters based on security requirements.

verification_result.description: Overall verification result: passed, failed, manual_review

fraud_indicators.description: List of potential fraud indicators detected
